mapper.select: SELECT p.name as postName,p.work_city as workCity,ra.approval_time as approvalTime,e.name as enterpriseName,a.status as status FROM approval_stage as a JOIN resume_approval ra ON a.id=ra.approval_stage_id JOIN submit s ON ra.submit_id = s.id JOIN post p ON s.post_id=p.id JOIN human_resource hs ON p.hr_id=hs.id JOIN enterprise e ON hs.firm_id=e.id WHERE s.stu_id = #{student.id} AND a.stage_name=#{resumeApprovalStage.stageName}

SELECT p.name as postName,p.work_city as workCity,e.name as enterpriseName FROM submit as s JOIN post p ON s.post_id=p.id JOIN human_resource hs ON p.hr_id=hs.id JOIN enterprise e ON hs.firm_id=e.id WHERE s.stu_id = #{resume.student.id} AND s.status=#{status}
